title: Perform For Me
description: Everyone has a kink...  Corey loves going to sex clubs to watch two guys having sex but on one night, he goes from being a voyeur to in the middle of two hot guys. After the dust settles, Corey is faced with the dilemma of blurred lines between love and kink. When the fantasy leaves club and lands in his bedroom, can he find his kinky ever after?  This book contains m/m/m interactions with strong romantic undertones. This story was previously published and has been edited and expanded for this edition.
author: Lori Toland
